hcts
Shorcut to make time series or line charts

#### Description 

Shorcut to make time series or line charts

#### Usage 
<pre><code>
hcts(x, ...)
</code></pre> 
#### Arguments 
 

* ``x``: A numeric vector or a time series object.
* ``... ``: Aditional argumentsfor the data series (http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#series).
